name: Rocket Surfer
description:
Save your rocket!

Rocket Surfer - Super cool motion animated game where rocket moves left and right when you move your iPhone left and right respectively.

It has 3 levels to play:

Normal: You just need to move left, right, top & bottom or any position (by tapping) to save from Asteroid(Stone).

Laser: In this level, Rocket will have a ​laser gun which continuously firing and you need to save your rocket. Here Asteroids are moving very quickly.

Bubble: Here rocket is using bubble to save from huge land-slice. It is a ​really amazing experience.

Enjoy free surfer game.
